items.sentence: Tom had dreamed of going to Harvard all his life.
Tom had enough money to buy everything he wanted.
Prices are lower on the other side of the border.
Put the key in the ignition and start the engine.
If Tom hadn\'t invited me, I wouldn\'t have come.
You haven\'t done anything I\'ve asked you to do.
Did you find anything that needs to be corrected?
Did you hear what happened at school last Monday?
There were quite a few interesting things to see.
I wasn\'t aware that Tom didn\'t have to do that.
I wasn\'t aware that Tom didn\'t need to do that.
I wasn\'t aware that Tom didn\'t want to do that.
I wasn\'t aware that Tom wasn\'t at school today.
Tom certainly doesn\'t have the money he used to.
Tom certainly isn\'t as popular as he used to be.
Tom should tell Mary that she shouldn\'t do that.
Tom shouldn\'t tell Mary anything about his past.
Tom wishes he could speak French as well as Mary.
Tom didn\'t let his children go to Mary\'s party.
When was the last time you went to a flea market?
